name: Time Doesn't Care
description:
Your health container has become disconnected and is floating away, but you are in the middle of a high paced battle! Thankfully your reaction time is so fast that time seems to slow the less you move. Just remember to take care not to shoot yourself!

How long can you last?


Made in 24 hours for the Extra Credits game jam #6

Controls:

 Move: WASD

Aim: Mouse

Shoot: Left mouse

Shield: Right mouse
